actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the widows of certain former members of the Armed Forces of the United States to use the services and facilities of post exchanges and commissaries.

summary.text: Entitles the surviving spouse of a former member of the armed forces, whose spouse's death was service-connected or whose spouse was totally disabled at the time of death as a result of a service-connected disability, to use the services and facilities of post exchanges and commissary stores operated under the jurisdiction of any military department. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1041)

titles.title: A bill to authorize the widows of certain former members of the Armed Forces of the United States to use the services and facilities of post exchanges and commissaries.
